SCTX:
Begin stal2Script

short stal2

if ( MenuMode == 1 )
	Return
endif

if ( OnActivate == 0 )
	Return
endif

if ( GetJournalIndex BM_Earth == 20 )
	Journal BM_Earth 30
endif

Act_BM_steam_02->Enable
PlaySound "BM pipe large"

if ( part == 0 )
	set stal2 to 1
elseif ( part == 8 )
	set stal2 to 2
else
	if ( part < 5 )
		set part to 0
	else
		set part to 6
	endif
	set Act_BM_pipe_01.stal1 to 0
	set Act_BM_pipe_03.stal3 to 0
endif

End stal2Script
